mapper.select: SELECT gb.isbn,gb.bookname,gb.price,gb.author,gb.gnumber,gb.ebookprice,gb.bookcontent,gb.bookidx, gb.bookpub,gb.bookscore,gb.bookpubdate,gb.bookimg,gb.scorecount,gb.bpoint,gb.gname FROM (SELECT b.*,g.gname FROM booklist b, genre g where b.gnumber = g.gnumber and b.isbn=#{isbn})gb

SELECT gb.isbn,gb.bookname,gb.price,gb.author,gb.gnumber,gb.ebookprice,gb.bookcontent,gb.bookidx, gb.bookpub,gb.bookscore,gb.bookpubdate,gb.bookimg,gb.scorecount,gb.bpoint,gb.gname FROM (SELECT ROWNUM r, b.*,g.gname FROM booklist b, genre g where b.gnumber = g.gnumber and b.gnumber=#{gnumber})gb where gb.r between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select count(gnumber) from booklist where gnumber=#{gNumber}

select br.isbn, br.bookname, br.price, br.bookcontent, br.bookPub, br.bookimg, br.bookscore, br.author, br.bookpubdate, br.bpoint from (select rownum r, bl.* from booklist bl where author like '%'||#{author}||'%' or bookname like '%'||#{bookName}||'%' or isbn like '%'||#{isbn}||'%' or bookpub like '%'||#{bookPub}||'%' or gnumber like '%'||#{gNumber}||'%')br where r between 1 and 10
